title: Language Resource Sharing and Utilization Strategy through Federated Educational Digital Repository Construction

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and experience managing educational materials
context.additional_context: Providing practical solutions for teachers and administrators managing multilingual resources across platforms in educational settings.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the federated operation principles of diverse educational digital repositories and apply them to real-world cases.
Learners can design metadata utilization strategies based on open standards such as IEEE LOM and IMS DRI.
Learners can plan and execute repository integration projects considering interoperability of language education materials.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
